brand-1.name: Content Quality & Relevance
brand-1.description: Analyzes content alignment with AI search patterns and user intent signals

insights.title: Strong topical authority in cloud computing
insights.description: Your content demonstrates deep expertise in cloud infrastructure topics, which AI models consistently cite.

insights.title: Thin coverage on emerging AI topics
insights.description: Limited content addressing AI/ML infrastructure, a growing search trend.

issues.title: Outdated statistics in 15 articles
issues.description: Content references 2022-2023 data that AI models flag as potentially outdated.
issues.impact: Reduced trust signals in AI-generated responses

recommendations.title: Update statistical references across key articles
recommendations.description: Refresh data points in top-performing articles to reflect 2024-2025 trends.

recommendations.title: Create AI infrastructure content pillar
recommendations.description: Develop 8-10 articles covering AI/ML ops, GPU infrastructure, and AI model deployment.

brand-1.name: Entity & Knowledge Graph
brand-1.description: Evaluates brand entity recognition and knowledge graph positioning across AI models

insights.title: Consistent entity recognition across GPT-4 and Claude
insights.description: Brand name and key products are correctly identified 94% of the time.

insights.title: Missing entity relationships for executive team
insights.description: AI models lack structured data about company leadership.

issues.title: Competitor confusion in knowledge graphs
issues.description: TechVista is sometimes conflated with TechView in AI model responses.
issues.impact: Brand dilution in 18% of competitive queries

recommendations.title: Implement structured data for leadership
recommendations.description: Add schema.org Person markup for C-suite and key team members.

brand-1.name: E-E-A-T Signals
brand-1.description: Measures Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness indicators

insights.title: Strong author credentials
insights.description: 85% of content is authored by verified domain experts with public profiles.

issues.title: Limited third-party validation
issues.description: Few external sources cite TechVista content in authoritative contexts.
issues.impact: Moderate trust ceiling in AI model training data

recommendations.title: Launch thought leadership PR campaign
recommendations.description: Target placement in industry publications to build citation footprint.

brand-1.name: Semantic Search Alignment
brand-1.description: Analyzes content optimization for natural language queries and AI search patterns

insights.title: Keyword-stuffing patterns detected
insights.description: 12 articles show unnatural keyword density that AI models may penalize.

issues.title: Poor answer-box optimization
issues.description: Content structure doesn't align with Q&A patterns AI models prefer.

recommendations.title: Restructure top 20 articles for Q&A format
recommendations.description: Add clear question-answer sections optimized for AI extraction.

brand-1.name: Citation & Source Quality
brand-1.description: Evaluates external references, link quality, and source trustworthiness

insights.title: High-quality academic citations
insights.description: 68% of external links point to peer-reviewed or authoritative sources.

insights.title: Broken links affecting trust
insights.description: 47 broken external links detected across content corpus.

issues.title: Outdated source material
issues.description: Many citations reference pre-2023 sources in rapidly evolving topics.
issues.impact: Content may be deprioritized in AI model rankings

recommendations.title: Audit and replace broken links
recommendations.description: Fix or replace all 47 broken citations within 2 weeks.

brand-1.name: Non-Branded Visibility
brand-1.description: Tracks brand appearance in AI responses for non-branded, intent-driven queries

insights.title: Low inclusion in comparison queries
insights.description: TechVista rarely appears in 'best cloud providers' or similar queries.

issues.title: Missing from AI model training data
issues.description: Limited indexed content in AI model knowledge cutoffs.
issues.impact: Brand omitted from 73% of relevant non-branded queries

recommendations.title: Increase content distribution to indexed sources
recommendations.description: Publish guest posts on high-authority sites likely in AI training data.

brand-1.name: Competitive Positioning
brand-1.description: Benchmarks brand against competitors in AI-generated responses and rankings

insights.title: Outperforming direct competitors in technical depth
insights.description: TechVista content is cited more frequently than top 3 competitors in technical queries.

insights.title: Lower mention rate in general queries
insights.description: Larger competitors dominate brand awareness queries.

issues.title: Competitive gaps in solution comparison content
issues.description: Competitors have stronger presence in AI-powered comparison tables.
issues.impact: Missing from 62% of competitive evaluation queries

recommendations.title: Create transparent comparison content
recommendations.description: Develop objective TechVista vs. Competitor guides that AI models trust.
